meanings.definition: relating to or occurring in the intestines
meanings.sent1: The enteral health of the patient was carefully monitored by the doctor.
meanings.sent2: The enteral system plays a vital role in digestion.
meanings.sent3: The enteral bacteria were having a party in the intestines.
meanings.sent4: Her love for spicy food was enteral, always causing a stir in her stomach.
meanings.sent5: The enteral environment of the intestines is crucial for nutrient absorption.

meanings.definition: relating to or denoting a method of feeding that involves passing nutrients directly into the stomach or intestines
meanings.sent1: The enteral feeding tube provided essential nutrients to the patient.
meanings.sent2: The enteral method of feeding is commonly used in hospitals.
meanings.sent3: The enteral feeding bag decided to take a vacation to the intestines.
meanings.sent4: Her care for others was enteral, always ensuring they were well-fed.
meanings.sent5: The enteral feeding process bypasses the mouth and goes straight to the stomach.
